questions.question_text: What is the primary function of the Task Manager in Windows?
questions.options_json: {"A": "To manage user accounts and permissions", "B": "To monitor system performance and resource usage", "C": "To configure network settings and connections", "D": "To troubleshoot and debug Windows issues"}
questions.explanation: The Task Manager is used to monitor system performance, including CPU, memory, and disk usage. This helps users identify resource-intensive processes and optimize their system for better performance.
